name: Doors of Fate
description:
Doors of Fate is a puzzle game with some horror elements about navigating through a dark and mysterious dimension. Solve puzzles by manipulating time, literally, and discover a dark secret.

"Time is never on our side, but what if it was? What if we could manipulate time?" Doors of Fate will require you to solve puzzles by changing your system's time, but...

---===0===---

Created for the game jam "a jam about time".

Controls: move with WASD or arrow keys, press 'e' to interact with stuff.
